name: ormSearch
description: Searches for given text in specific properties or entities.

params.name: query_text
params.description: The text to be searched for or a complete Lucene query.In the case of ORMSearch('query_text', 'entityName'), only Lucene query is supported. For details of Lucene query, see http://lucene.apache.org/core/old_versioned_docs/versions/3_0_0/queryparsersyntax.html

params.name: entityName
params.description: Name of the entity to be searched.

params.name: fields
params.description: Fields in which search has to be performed. This can be an array of strings. If you are performing a Lucene query, you need not specify this field. In other words, if you do not specify this value, a Lucene query is performed. Field name is case-sensitive.

params.name: optionMap
params.description: Extra options that can be passed while executing Lucene query. The options are: Sort, Offset, maxResults

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: ORM search based on Lucene query.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: ORM search on all subentities based on Lucene query
